attributes.action: Save Manor Training & Resource Centre (MaTReC) from closure after 31 years.
attributes.additional_details:
Our objectives:
•Helping to re-engage adults furthest away from the job market
•identifying and removing barriers to learning
•teaching functional skills English, Maths and ICT
•supporting adults with specific learning difficulties to reach their potential
•assisting adults to gain confidence and self esteem.
attributes.background: MaTReC  provides low cost training, education, resources and employment to disadvantaged people living in the Manor and surrounding areas of Sheffield. Supporting individuals gain qualifications and make informed choices about their own development enabling them to maximise their full potential.

rejection.details: Manor Training & Resource Centre is a charity, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
